item.title: How to make mining/wcing ect. faster
item.dc:creator: @modbrian modbrian
item.description:
@modbrian wrote:

ok you gotta change the timers, find the object ID for the mining rock and tree in ur server and search them in client.java.

i think the mining rocks Id is 2111, so search case 2111 and it will show a code like this…

case 2111:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14);
addItem(995, 1000000);
sendMessage(“You Gain Some Mining, and get some Cash!!”);
setAnimation(624);
actionTimer = 15;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

im not sure if you want exp or the timers faster, but if u want the exp faster just change the ((1700 * in teh second line to like ((2000 * or something. and if you want to change the time in which you can mine the rock change the actionTimer in the 6th.

compile and you should have no errors and it should work

Read full topic
